entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
